title: Formula 1 - 2011 - R07 - Canada Grand Prix - Globo TV (Brazil)
description:
Filetype: MP4
Size:  862 MB
Resolution: 640x360
Duration: 1:58:31

Formula 1 - 2011 season - Round 07 - Canada Grand Prix [INCOMPLETE RECORDING]

Provided by The Berus. 

I must beg the pardon of all of you. I had many problems while recording this video: Globo TV is the major open TV channel here in Brazil. Because of that, they also broadcast the brazilian football (soccer for americans) championship matches. Given the fact that the audience of football matches are hugely higher than Formula 1 races (specially after Ayrton Senna's death, 17 years ago), they stopped broadcasting the race to transmit a football match. After its end, the race was still 10 laps to go and they resumed broadcasting, but I had troubles recording these exciting laps.

I am deeply sorry for this incomplete record that I'm making available due to the respect I have for you, fellas, that are supporting my initiative. See you all in 2 weeks for the European Grand Prix at Valencia, Spain.
